attributes.action: Raise the tax on "SUPER STRENGTH ALCOHOL" - to limit its destructive hold on alcohol dependents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Super strength alcohol -

cheap and available on almost every street corner making it harder for alcohol dependant people to give up their addiction, in particular those who are unemployed/low income or homeless.

Just one 500ml can contains 4.5 units of alcohol, exceeding the governments daily safe drinking level.

Demand a higher rate of tax on these drinks, making them economically unviable to produce.
